text:
Why Do People Sleep?

Everyone needs sleep. It is important for the body and the brain. When we sleep, our body rests and gets energy. Sleep helps us stay healthy, think better, and feel good.

Most people sleep at night. Adults need about 7 to 9 hours of sleep. Children and babies need more. If we don’t sleep enough, we feel tired, sad, or sick.

Good sleep means going to bed at the same time every night. It also helps to turn off lights and phones. Drinking warm milk or reading a book can help you relax before bed.

So remember — sleep is not just rest. It’s part of staying strong and happy!
